titles.title: Youth Prevention and Recovery Reauthorization Act of 2025
Youth Prevention and Recovery Reauthorization Act of 2025
A bill to amend the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act to reauthorize the youth prevention and recovery initiative, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
